question: I am a 30 year old man, I have abdominal pain, blood in my stool, food intolerance to eggs, red meat, fried anything etc., excessive weight gain (I gained so much weight in a month I was covered up and down my arms with purple stripes they were stretch marks) and frequent extreme diarrhea (3-4 times a day).  I have had a upper and lower GI (normal), a complete colonoscopy (normal), tested for diabetes (don't have it), just had a ultra sound on my gall bladder (normal), been checked for parasites (don't have any), and I am very tired all the time.  I have always been an active person.  What could I possibly have, I have been seeing doctors for years, please any suggestions?
title: PLEASE HELP!  I have abdominal pain for years?
